titles.title: Täʾamrä Maryam “Miracles of Mary” / Täʾamrä ʾIyäsus “Miracles of Jesus” / Täʾamrä Mar Giyorgis “Miracles of Mar Giyorgis” / Täʾamrä Mikaʾel “Miracles of Michael” / Täʾamrä Gäbrä Mänfäs Qǝddus “Miracles of Gäbrä Mänfäs Qǝddus” / Excerpt from Säʿatat zä-lelit “Horologium for the Night” / Täʾamrihomu lä-ʾab wä-wäld wä-mänfäs qǝddus “Miracles of the Father and the Son and the Holy Spirit”

shortcontents.shortcontent:
I) Täʾamrä Maryam “Miracles of Mary" (fols. 3ra-66ra) I-1) Mäṣḥafä śǝrʿat, Introductory rite of al-Muʿallaqah and hymns (fol. 3ra-7ra) I-2) Introductory exhortation (fols. 7rb-8va) I-3) ʾƎsäggǝd läki wä-ʾǝweddǝsäki ... “I worship Thee ...” (fols. 8va-9rb) I-4) ʾƎsäggǝd lä-mäläkotǝkä... “I worship Thy Godhead…” (fols. 9va-11va) I-5) Täʾamrä Maryam “Miracles of Mary”: 70 miracles (fols. 13ra-66ra) II) Täʾamrä ʾIyasus “Miracles of Jesus”: 21 miracles (fols. 66va-86rb) III) Täʾamrä Mar Giyorgis “Miracles of Mar Giyorgis”: 3 miracles and one ʿarke hymn (fols. 86va-88rb) IV) Täʾamrä Mikaʾel “Miracles of Michael”: 3 miracles (fols. 88va-90rb) V) Täʾamrä Gäbrä Mänfäs Qǝddus “Miracles of Gäbrä Mänfäs Qǝddus”: 3 miracles (fols. 90va-93rb) VI) Excerpt from Säʿatat zä-lelit “Horologium for the Night” (MSLN p. 116: ኢየሱስ፡ ክርስቶስ፡ ጥዑመ፡ ስም፡ ለዘይጼውዖ፡ ኢየሱስ፡ ክርስቶስ፡ ኅብስተ፡ ሕይወት፡ ለዘይበልዖ …) (fols. 93va-vb) VII) Täʾamrihomu lä-ʾab wä-wäld wä-mänfäs qǝddus “Miracles of the Father and the Son and the Holy Spirit”: 3 miracles (fols. 94ra-95ra)
Additio 1.

copyists.copyist: Zä-Dǝngǝl is mentioned as the scribe in supplications on fols. 67vb and 90rb. He is the same scribe who copied Mss. MY-019, MR-040, QQM-006 etc.

donors.donor: Several names are mentioned in supplications formulas throughout all texts, like: Zärʾa Dawit (fols. 8rb, 11va, 15rb etc.), ʾAmosyas (fols. 11va 13ra, 16ra etc.), Wälättä Maryam (fols. 15ra, 16va, 22rb etc.), Wäldä Śǝllase (fols. 13vb, 19ra, 19vb etc.), Ḥǝzqǝyas (fols. 14rb, 16ra, 17b etc.).

txstates.txstate: The Ms. is worn. The Ms. was resewn and an overback added.

bindings.binding: Two wooden boards covered with dark reddish-brown tooled leather. Overback made of reddish-brown tooled leather. Two pairs of sewing stations.

bndecorations.bndecoration: Blind tooled ornament on the dark brown leather cover is poorly executed (at least seven tools were used: single line fillet, interlaced line fillet, single circle, corni form, small x, double sine wave with dots, cross hatching). Blind tooled ornament on the reddish-brown overback (three tools were used: single line fillet, interlaced line fillet, double sine wave with dots).

bnothers.bnother: Two pairs of chains of endband stitches at the spine cover.

squires.squire:
A(2/fols. 1r-2v) – I(10; s.l.: 5, stub before 6; 6, stub after 4/fols. 3r-12v) – II(10/fols. 13r-22v) – III(10/fol. 23r-32v) – IV(10; s.l.: 4, stub after 7; 5, stub before 6; 6, stub after stub of 7; 7, stub after 4/fols. 33r-42v) – V(10; s.l.: 4, stub before 6; 5, stub before stub of 4; 6, stub after stub of 7; 7, stub after 3/fols. 43r-52v) – VI(10; s.l.: 5, stub before 6; 6, stub after 4/fols. 53r-62v) – VII(12/fols. 63r-74v) – VIII(11; s.l.: 6, stub before 7/fols. 75r-85v) – IX(9; s.l.: 4, stub before 7; 5, stub after 6; 6, stub after 5/fols. 86r-94v) – B(2/fols. 95r-96v)
The quire structure cannot be determined with certainty, due to its unusual arrangement.

taunit.rl-info: Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/A. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

rubrications.rubrication:
Nomina sacra; names of the protagonists and oher characters like Yoḥannǝs (fols. 5rb) and Mikaʾel (fol. 94vb); names of the donors; the words sälam “salutation” and hale luya in Text I-1, the word śǝllase “trinity”; elements of the punctuation signs; elements of Ethiopic numerals.
Several groups of lines on the incipit page of Texts I-1 and I-5, alternating with black lines; two initial lines of the incipit of Texts I-2, II, III and VII; initial word of Texts I-3, I-4 and VI; three initial lines of Texts IV and V; two initial lines of the sections of Texts I-5 and II and its section numbers.

otherdetails.otherdetail:
Text I-1 includes the hymns: - ʾO-ʾәgzǝʾtǝyä Maryam qǝddǝst dǝngǝl ʾǝmmu lä-ʾIyäsus Krǝstos kähali ... "O my Lady, Holy Virgin Mary, Mother of Jesus Christ the Almighty ..." (fol. 6rb) (cp. ChRep no. 373) - Sälam läki ʾo-ʾәgzǝʾtǝyä Maryam ʾǝmmä bǝrhan wä-ʾǝmmä mädḫǝn ... "Salutation to you, o my Lady Mary, Mother of the Light and Mother of the Saviour ..." (fols. 6rb-7ra).
The miracles of St. Mary (Text I-5) and of Jesus (Text II) are numbered.

additional.cont: Fol. 11va-vb: List of the children of Gäbrä ˀƎgziˀabǝḥer (?).
additional.det: The names are written in recent hand, in purple ink.

extras.extra: - The scribe used compressed script on fols. 5ra-vb. - Omitted letters or words inserted interlineally: e.g., fols. 4rb, 33ra, 39vb, 41va, 45va, 55va, 55vb, 59vb, 89vb, 90va. - Scribbles on fol. 76rv.

txfindingaids.txfindingaid: - (Coloured) thread inserted in the outer upper corner of fol. 83.
